components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 November 2023 at 13:00 PST until 21 November 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 November 2023 at 22:00 PST until 22 November 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Canada handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: South Korea SMS Carrier Maintenance - KT Freetel, SK Telecom and LG U+

incident_updates.body: The KT Freetel, SK Telecom and LG U+ networks in South Korea are conducting a planned maintenance from 22 November 2023 at 7:00 PST until 22 November 2023 at 12:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to KT Freetel, SK Telecom and LG U+ South Korea handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 November 2023 at 10:00 PST until 22 November 2023 at 12:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 22 November 2023 at 12:00 PST until 22 November 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 November 2023 at 12:00 PST until 23 November 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 November 2023 at 00:00 PST until 24 November 2023 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup Line Type Intelligence (Twilio API), Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 November 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 November 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilios France phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 November 2023 at 14:00 PST until 27 November 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 22:00 PST until 28 November 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delivery report delay from AT&T US to Twilio Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 November 2023 at 21:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Shortcodes and Longcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2023 at 13:00 PST until 05 December 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a panned maintenance from 06 December 2023 at 21:00 PST until 06 December 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carrier and country: Telus and Koodo networks in Canada

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio's Messaging Services Feature is Undergoing a Routine Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all countries between 11:00 PM and 12:00 AM Pacific Time on 12/14/2023. During the maintenance window, customers will see high latency and possible 5xx errors while trying to add/remove senders from a Messaging Service.

There will be no impact on any of the messages being sent via a messaging service.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Israel is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 20 November 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Israel handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 02 November 2023 at 00:00 PDT
08 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 09 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
15 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 16 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
29 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
